• Rugman-Jones et al. 2013. The Lesser of Two Weevils: Molecular-Genetics of Pest Palm Weevil Populations Confirm Rhynchophorus vulneratus (Panzer 1798) as a Valid Species Distinct from R. ferrugineus (Olivier 1790), and Reveal the Global Extent of Both, PLOS ONE.
  • Pachur et al. 2014. We’ll Meet Again: Revealing Distributional and Temporal Patterns of Social Contact, PLOS ONE
